long_description: The minimalist Amphipod Profile UltraLite Hydration Belt offers easy access to fluids, keys, ID, smartphone and nutrition when you're on the run, all with a comfortable no-bounce design. 2 low-profile Hydraform bottles with leak-free spouts provide 21 fl. oz. total capacity; bottles automatically lock in place, helping eliminate bottle bounce and fallout. Integrated sleeve design allows effortless single-handed bottle access. Breathable, hip-gripping AirStretch belt and custom quick-release buckle. The Amphipod Profile UltraLite Hydration Belt features a secure zippered pocket and reflective detailing.
short_description: The minimalist Amphipod Profile UltraLite Hydration Belt offers easy access to fluids, keys, ID, smartphone and nutrition when you're on the run, all with a comfortable no-bounce design.
